release.action: Added scheduling dialog. The scheduling dialog provides a list of all blocks and their timings as well as a graphical display of the block dependencies.
Snap blocks to grid on drop
Added consistency checking to project management
Changed unit of all timings from ms to ns
Warn if a project is saved to a directory that already contains a project file
Ask to save changed files on project close
Fixed bug in project management that caused connections to be restored incorrectly when a saved project was opened
